metadata.name: Gold Blind Bag (EXCLUSIVE FOR ETHER CARD OG OWNERS)
metadata.description:
This pack is exclusively for Ether Card OG owners only. 

WARNING: Do not attempt to purchase this pack if you have not registered your Ether Card OG at [EtherCards Wallet](https://explorer.ether.cards/#/wallet) as THE PURCHASE WILL BE REJECTED and YOU WILL LOSE YOUR GAS!

Contains: 3 x DirtyRobot Summer NFTs (Day/Night variations)

This Gold Blind bag features three of DirtyRobot’s Summer Season Day or Night NFTs. With a Day and Night variation for each of the four images, try and collect a pair to forge together and produce the stunning Time-Evolving edition. Each variation is limited to only 500 pieces.

By forging them together, you will have the chance to collect bonus Traits. Collect all four Time-Evolving editions as you work your way towards the final prizes and become a DirtyRobot Master Collector.

For more details: [https://dirtyrobot.com](https://dirtyrobot.com)
metadata.about:
As day turns to night and night turns to day in this endless cycle, the Seasons collection represents those special moments suspended in time, whether it’s in peaceful solitude or with the ones you love. This collection is a series of NFTs based around the four seasons — Summer, Autumn, Winter, & Spring.

The four collections will feature 16 images, each with 2 phases, exclusively designed for this series by the inspirational artist DirtyRobot. Each image will be time-based, evolving through a series of phases, depending on the time of day it is.

For more details: https://dirtyrobot.com
